name: Block Buster Graffiti Edition
description: A version of a block breaker game custom tailored with awesome graffiti images and custom made music in the background. Bust through 5 levels with a dodgeball to win. This game is still in development with more features being added soon such as lives, more levels, power ups, etc. Thanks so much for your support and please feel free to leave any feedback and donations to help make more games and improve older games!
